gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: CAMP: Tibet Surface Meteorology and Radiation Data Set
CAMP: Tibet Surface Meteorology and Radiation Data Set

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Disaster Prevention Research Institute, Kyoto University okasho, Uji, Kyoto Pref., 611-0011

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains the Coordinated Energy and Water Cycle Observation Project (CEOP) Enhanced Observing Period 3 (EOP-3) and Enhanced Observing Period 4 (EOP-4) CEOP Asia-Australia Monsoon Project (CAMP) Tibet Hourly Surface Meteorology and Radiation Data Set. There are 12 stations included in this dataset. This dataset contains the entire EOP-3 and EOP-4 time period (i.e., 1 October 2002 through 31 December 2004). This data set contains both ASCII data and netCDF data. The ASCII data file covers the entire time period for all stations. The netCDF data file covers the entire time period with one netCDF file for each station.

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Disaster Prevention Research Institute, Kyoto University okasho, Uji, Kyoto Pref., 611-0011

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: NetCDF: Network Common Data Form for CEOP (application/x-netcdf)
